jobDescription: Description  We are looking for an experienced and well-rounded engineer to join our growing team. Our ideal candidate would be passionate about learning and using computing and data science to help deliver end-to-end production solutions that raise the bar on innovation and quality. While the emphasis of this position is hands-on solution development in Forecasting, Fulfillment Operations Scheduling, Transportation Optimization, Replenishment and Inventory Planning application development, you will have opportunities to collaborate closely with Data Scientists on the underlying problems applying Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Optimization techniques.
